data.message: Eminem showed me how to rap from his music

replies.message: Im hearing his music right now kings never die
Drop a freestyle if you bout it
Type some bars up below vvv

Forget rap stars, you need rock n roll. Rap is all the same and that shit gets old. Just a bunch of pussies taking about all their materialistic crap, sluts they fuck and every city on the map. You don't have to be smart to rhyme some words, but you have to be 'controversial' if you want to be heard.

There's a freestyle for you idiots. Rap sucks. Listen to some real music, ya know, that wasn't dubbed, recycled from the 80s and shouted over by some man child with sagging pants and bad teeth.

New Music Video - FREESTYLE x FRIDAY . Share it for me will ya. 
https://www.facebook.com/jaysaint.dasynnr/videos/vb.1594779507467415/1624042501207782/?type=3&theater'

Do you have a #Monster within you? Im sure everybody does somewhere deep in themselves right. I would like to present to you 

" JaySaint Da Synnr - Im a Monster now x Sir Flo x Sammi Auto "

Just a lil Single i cooked up with some homies from my Home town. Enjoy the track and Share away. Dont forget to VOTE today for my submission in the FV contest this year and get Ready for my new Album that will be dropping soon. #ChronicLogic
